_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Moviebattles 2 (Jedi Academy)
author: dominique@wellisch-itservice.de

installation.script:
echo "Installling JKA Base"
cd /mnt/server
wget https://wellisch-itservice.de/base.zip
unzip base.zip
rm base.zip

echo "Installing OpenJK"
curl https://api.github.com/repos/jacoders/openjk/releases/latest | grep "browser_download_url.*OpenJK-linux-x86_64.tar.gz" | cut -d : -f 2,3 | tr -d \" | wget -qi -
openjk=$(find OpenJK-linux*)
cd /mnt/server && tar -xvf ${openjk} && 
rm ${openjk}

echo "Installing MB2 Updater"
wget https://www.moviebattles.org/download/MBII_CLI_Updater.zip
unzip MBII_CLI_Updater.zip
rm MBII_CLI_Updater.zip
wget ${SERVER_DOWNLOAD} -v -O mod.zip
unzip mod.zip
rm mod.zip
cd /mnt/server/MBII && mv -f jampgamei386.so jampgamei386.jamp.so
cd /mnt/server/MBII && cp jampgamei386.nopp.so jampgamei386.so
chmod +x mbiided.i386
chmod +x linuxjampded

echo "Copying default config"
cp /mnt/server/MBII/server_config_default.cfg /mnt/server/MBII/server.cfg
